short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert HTML tables to Excel files with hover effect

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The function of this extension is to facilitate users to select the entire table and copy the data in the table. When the web page displays data through the HTML table tag, if the user manually moves the mouse to select data, because the table may be very long, the operation of selecting data may be very complicated. This plug-in can facilitate users to quickly select the current table for copying, or download it as an Excel file.
